flavor: Chastise the guilty once, and they may listen. Again, and they will surely scowl.
text: {Silence 3} [i] target {Uncontrolled} opponent.
title: Chastise

flavor: My blade shall not run red for the likes of you.
text: Draw a card for each {Attack} card you've resolved this turn. Become {Chivalrous} [c].
title: Clean thy Blade

flavor: Knights have been called unwise. Stupid. But never coward.
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. {Stun} them. <(They lose a resource of their choice.)>
title: Daring Strike

flavor: Are you worthy of the Lady's blessing?
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. At the start of your turn, you may make a tile near {Enchanted Lake} {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Enchanted Lake

flavor: And thus, his strike rang throughout the land, never to be forgotten.
text: Deal 5 damage to target enemy. Make a tile near you {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Enchanted Strike

flavor: There is a pride in Calbrians that transcends wealth or glory.
text: You may play a card for 1 less [a]. <(This can't reduce the action cost of that card to 0.)>
title: For the King

flavor: Have your wits about you, for battle commences!
text: Deal 7 damage to target enemy. Become {Chivalrous} [c].
title: Have At Thee

flavor: The darkest hour comes just before the dawn.
text: {Attach} to yourself until your next turn. If you would take damage, instead prevent that damage and put that many cards from your deck into your discard.
title: Have Faith

flavor: There are holy sites in Calbria where it is said that no lies may be told.
text: Make two target tiles {Enchanted Terrain} [et]. Draw a card.
title: Holy Ground

flavor: To be in the presence of a knight is to experience humility.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Each player discards down to four cards.
title: Humble

flavor: The Lady watches diligently through the eyes of her chosen.
text: {Attach} to target opponent. After they dishonor the code of {Chivalry}, deal 2 damage to them.
title: Judgment

flavor: No wrong shall go unrighted! No darkness shall persist undone!
text: Deal 10 damage to target enemy. If you're {Chivalrous}, {Slow 2} [o] and {Silence 2} [i] them.
title: Justice

flavor: On this hallowed day, the Lady will find a new champion.
text: Gain a random {Relic}. If you've already gained a {Relic} this game, instead deal 5 damage to each opponent.
title: Light of Dawn

flavor: Even the wicked are compelled to work no treachery in its shadow.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. Opponents near {Oathstone} can't spend [n].
title: Oathstone

flavor: A vow is more than a promise. It is a way of life.
text: Become {Chivalrous} [c].
title: Proclaim

flavor: Take heart, for She watches over you.
text: Heal yourself 4 HP. After {Providence} is sent to the discard, draw a card.
title: Providence

flavor: The guilty are not always repentant. That's where you come in.
text: {Counter} target card unless its controller pays 3 {Resources}. If the card is {Countered}, {Disarm 3} [d] them.
title: Rebuke

flavor: The time has come to sacrifice who you are for who you can become.
text: You must be {Chivalrous} to play {Reliquary}. Gain a random {Relic}.
title: Reliquary

flavor: Remove thyself from my presence, for there are damsels to be saved!
text: Deal 6 damage to target enemy. You may {Travel} them one tile.
title: Stand Aside

flavor: It is a duel you desire? Then it is death you shall have!
text: {Travel} another target character and yourself each up to one tile towards each other.
title: Throw the Gauntlet

text: {Attach} to yourself. After an opponent discards a card from their hand, deal 1 damage to each opponent. At the end of your turn, each opponent that has taken 6 or more damage this turn discards a card.
title: Ashes to Ashes

flavor: Your power transcends a simple mortal coil.
text: {Counter} target {Attack} card targeting you unless its controller pays 2 {Resources}.
title: Blur

text: {Attach} to target empty tile. At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to each enemy near {Chaos Storm}. Each opponent dealt damage this way discards a card. If no enemies are near {Chaos Storm}, instead {Reattach} it to a nearby empty tile.
title: Chaos Storm

flavor: You think you're getting out of this alive? Think again.
text: Deal 7 damage to target enemy. Make two tiles near them {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Embercrash

flavor: The rivalry betwixt wizard and sorcerer is a bitter and prideful struggle.
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. {Slow 1} [o] them.
title: Enfeeble

flavor: Stray magic can only truly be cultivated by those with innate power.
text: Make target tile {Enchanted Terrain} [et]. After {Flare} is sent to the discard, {Stun} each opponent. <(They each lose a resource of their choice.)>
title: Flare

flavor: I craft this world in my image. You may find it hard to fit in.
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. They discard a card.
title: Flick of the Wrist

flavor: You will not move. You will not even blink.
text: {Slow 1} [o] target opponent. If you played {Glare} in response to a card affected by {Slow} [o], gain 1 [a].
title: Glare

flavor: I may be struck down and cast out, but they will never take what burns in my heart.
text: You may only play {Inner Fire} if you have 2 or less [p]. Draw a card.
title: Inner Fire

flavor: Never underestimate the depths of a sorcerer's grudge.
text: Draw two cards. Then, each player discards a card.
title: Ire

flavor: Get away from me! You don't understand!
text: {Travel} each other character one tile away from you. Draw a card.
title: Lash Out

flavor: A sorcerer simply wishes it to be and it is so. What could you claim to possess?
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - You may play a card. It gains {Heroic} [h]. <(It ignores control.)>
title: Make So

flavor: Sorcerers often don't understand their power and destroy themselves in bouts of rage.
text: Deal 6 damage to target enemy. {Unleash} - deal 2 more damage to them and 1 damage to yourself per extra [p] spent.
title: Melt

flavor: From where power comes matters not. I will have my revenge!
text: Choose one: - Put the top five cards of your deck into your discard. - Remove target {Terrain}.
title: Rip Magic

flavor: I will pluck the courage from your heart, knight.
text: Deal 5 damage to target enemy. {Unleash} - apply an instance of {Control} to them for each extra [p] spent.
title: Scorn

flavor: Burn victims were common at the Academy before sorcery was prohibited.
text: {Slow 1} [o], {Silence 1} [i] and {Disarm 1} [d] target opponent near a tile with {Terrain}.
title: Singe

flavor: I need more magic... I need more power...
text: {Attach} to yourself. When you're {Uncontrolled} and have no [p], gain 1 [p].
title: Sorcery

text: Deal 5 damage to target enemy. {Stun} them. <(They lose a resource of their choice.)> Gain a {Resource} of each type they did not lose.
title: Warpfire

flavor: Sorcerers command power much older and far greater than the magic of the Academy.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to each enemy near {Wild Magic}.
title: Wild Magic

flavor: Bend the knee to your better, knight.
text: {Disarm 2} [d] target opponent. They discard a card.
title: Wither

text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> {Attach} to target card you control. After that card is destroyed, you may play it for {free} [f], drawing {range} [r] from the tile it was in.
title: Arcane Lock

flavor: W-woah... I've never seen the stars up so close before...
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> {Slow 1} [o] and {Silence 2} [i] target opponent.
title: Befuddle

flavor: The stars align to conjure such power only once every millenia.
text: Deal 12 damage to each character near target tile. Make each tile near that tile {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Comet

text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> Deal 8 damage to target enemy. If you spent [n] to play {Cosmic Blast}, instead deal 4 damage to them.
title: Cosmic Blast

flavor: It's a gamble whether an Academy tome will be helpful or pesky.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Deal 3 damage to target enemy.
title: Dismiss

flavor: Yes, of course, the answer lies in the Ley! It has to be there! Musn't it, Featherface?
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> Draw two cards.
title: Eureka

text: {Attach} to yourself. After an opponent resolves a card targeting you, {Slow 1} [o] them. At the start of your turn, if an opponent is {Slowed}, {Destroy} {Flux} and gain 1 [a].
title: Flux

flavor: The Ley offers power and secrets beyond mortal comprehension.
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> {Attach} to target empty tile. At the end of your turn, if you are in {Leyline}, gain 1 [p].
title: Leyline

flavor: Time to put my studies to the test!
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
title: Magic Missiles

flavor: Multiple Academy courses are devoted to the proper folding of magical properties.
text: Gain [n].
title: Manafold

flavor: Weaving magic is not easy. Only masters can wield it in battle.
text: Gain [n], then you may play a card. <(That card doesn't need the instant icon!)>
title: Quicken

flavor: Bippity, boppity... boom!
text: {Attach} to yourself. At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to each opponent.
title: Shooting Stars

flavor: Some, more brazen Wizards would argue that it's about the quantity, not the quality.
text: Deal 5 damage to target enemy. Gain [n].
title: Spellsling

flavor: Your execution is lacking. Allow me.
text: {Counter} target card unless its controller pays 2 {Resources}. If a {Non-Feat} card was {Countered} in this way, put that card into your hand.
title: Spellsteal

flavor: Beholding the wonders of magic is a truly marvelous thing.
text: {Starlight} costs 1 less [a] to play if you've gained more than one [n] or spent [n] beyond a core game action this turn.
title: Starlight

flavor: The Academy strictly forbids students from manipulating time.
text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. {Slow 3} [o] them. Gain [n].
title: Stop

flavor: Those that make mischief in the King's Court take substantial risks.
text: {Travel} target enemy up to two tiles. {Slow 1} [o] and {Disarm 1} [d] them.
title: Telekinesis

flavor: Disappearing in a wave of arcane energy after the first lecture of the quarter is a tried and true favorite of Academy professors.
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> {Travel} to another target tile.
title: Teleport

flavor: No. No! This is madness! This can't be real!
text: {Disarm 1} [d] target opponent.
title: Unravel

flavor: Senior pranks at the Academy often get a bit out of hand.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to each enemy near {Vortex} and {Travel} them one tile towards it.
title: Vortex

flavor: The Lady works in mysterious ways.
text: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest into your discard.
title: Boon

flavor: If I am to die today, I will fall with the Lady at my side.
text: {Attach} to yourself. If you would receive {Control}, instead {Destroy} {Dignity}.
title: Dignity

flavor: Have you no shame? Face what you've become!
text: {Stun} target opponent. You choose which {Resource} they lose. <(They lose a resource of your choice.)> Draw a card.
title: Face Me

flavor: Die, betrayer! Burn in whatever pit awaits you!
text: Deal 12 damage to target enemy. They discard all but one card from their hand.
title: Fiendslayer

flavor: The heavens themselves strike you down!
text: Deal 6 damage to target enemy. {Disarm 2} [d] them.
title: Heaven Strikes

flavor: Remember this, knight—in your time of need, I shall be with you once again." — The Lady in the Crescent Chronicles
text: Become {Chivalrous} [c].
title: Kneel

text: Become {Chivalrous} [c]. {Attach} to yourself. At the start of your turn, gain 1 [a]. Then, if you are not {Chivalrous}, {Destroy} {Purpose}.
title: Purpose

flavor: A select few Knights of the Chalice wield skills long thought lost.
text: {Regain} a random {Relic} that you've already gained this game.
title: Reforge

flavor: Through any fire and any fury, a Saint will never abandon their people.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Heal target character 4 HP.
title: Sanctify

flavor: The ethereal blade is granted to those deemed worthy by the Lady.
text: {Stun} each opponent near target empty tile. <(They lose a resource of their choice.)> {Attach} to that tile. At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to each enemy near {Sword of Saints}.
title: Sword of Saints

flavor: Let slip the dogs of war!
text: Use your {Second Wind}. If you've already used your {Second Wind}, each opponent near you instead discards two cards.
title: Cry Havoc

flavor: You will find no quarter with me!
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. {Disarm 2} [d] them.
title: Cut Down

flavor: The bards shall sing of this in ballads forevermore!
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. Become {Chivalrous} [c]. If you're already {Chivalrous}, deal 2 more damage to them.
title: Gallant Strike

flavor: Damn the code! Honor will stop me no more!
text: You must be {Chivalrous} to play {No Mercy}. You dishonor the code of {Chivalry}, then gain [n].
title: No Mercy

flavor: The sites of old scattered across the realm hint at a storied past.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile at least three tiles away from you. After you enter {Relic Site}, gain a random {Relic}, then {Destroy} {Relic Site}.
title: Relic Site

flavor: Symbolic relics are laid out before the squire. It is a moment of clarity and truth.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Return an {Attack} card from your discard to your hand.
title: Rite of Arms

flavor: Steel is my grace, and battle my ball!
text: Deal 6 damage to target enemy. {Strike True} can't be {Countered}.
title: Strike True

flavor: Try me.
text: Choose one: - {Slow 2} [o] target opponent. - {Disarm 2} [d] target opponent.
title: Swordplay

flavor: Battle is where we find our honor, so to battle we fly!
text: {Travel} up to two tiles towards another target character.
title: To Battle

flavor: Tales are written not of the cautious nor the meek.
text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. You both discard a card.
title: Wild Steel

text: Replace one of your {Feats} with {Apotheosis}. <(If Apotheosis is destroyed, replace it with your old feat.)> {Attach} to yourself. At the end of your turn, {Invoke}. <(This counts as using your Second Wind.)>
title: Apotheosis

flavor: Few burn incidents in Calbria are accidental.
text: {Silence 2} [i] and {Disarm 2} [d] target opponent. {Unleash} - they discard a card for each extra [p] spent.
title: Char

flavor: There is beauty in our strength. Never let them tell you otherwise.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Gain 1 more [p].
title: Firepower

flavor: I'll melt you within your prison of steel before you can even begin, knight.
text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. {Silence 1} [i] them.
title: Flashburn

flavor: I've lost everything! It's time for you to lose something!
text: Deal 5 damage to target enemy. They discard a card.
title: Fry

text: Deal 8 damage to target enemy. {Unleash} - for each extra [p] spent, put the top card of your deck into your discard. Deal more damage to them equal to the total {Resource} cost of cards put into your discard this way.
title: Inferno

flavor: You won't find such magnificence at the Academy! Watch and learn!
text: {Pyre} can cause you to exceed your max [p].
title: Pyre

flavor: There is no strategy or discipline. Only an unbridled fury.
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. {Disarm 1} [d] them.
title: Sear

flavor: The last thing a peasant wants to see at the end of a work day.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. {Chaos Orb} gains the start and end of turn triggers of all {Non-Chaos Orb} cards attached to tiles near it.
title: Chaos Orb

flavor: The revenge Invokers seek often leaves them more empty than ever before.
text: Deal 2 damage to target enemy. {Unleash} - deal 1 more damage to them for each extra [p] spent. If you {Unleashed} {Spitfire}, gain 2 [p].
title: Spitfire

flavor: Out of my sight. Your words wound me.
text: Deal 4 damage to target enemy. {Travel} them up to one tile away from you.
title: Begone

flavor: You belong to me now, darling.
text: Deal 6 damage to target enemy. You may play a card, spending any combination of your {Resources} and their {Resources}.
title: Ensorcell

flavor: Do not make a sound. She prefers only her voice break the calm.
text: {Attach} to target empty tile. At the end of your turn, {Silence 2} [i] each opponent near {Hush}.
title: Hush

flavor: Sorry to cut our lovely little romance short, but I really must go.
text: {Travel} to another target tile near {Terrain}.
title: Jaunt

flavor: Your autumn realm inspires awe within the lessers gathered.
text: {Disarm 3} [d] target opponent, then {Attach} to them. Their maximum [p] is reduced by one. <(They don't lose excess resources.)>
title: Lullaby

text: {Attach} to yourself. At the start of your turn, make a tile near each opponent {Enchanted Terrain} [et]. After {Terrain} is made or removed near an enemy without having been replaced, deal 1 damage to them.
title: My Realm

flavor: There will be reward, in time. For now, you must sacrifice.
text: Opponents choose one: - You draw two cards and gain 2 [p]. - They collectively discard two cards and lose 2 [p].
title: Promise of Power

flavor: Rest well, good sir knight. You may not wake again.
text: {Slow 2} [o] target opponent. Make a tile near them {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Sleep

flavor: “You're so very far from home. Do be careful, my sweet.
text: {Silence 1} [i] target opponent. {Disarm 1} [d] them.
title: Spellbind

flavor: This is how my kindness is repaid? How dare you!
text: {Counter} target card unless its controller pays 3 {Resources}. If the card is {Countered}, they discard two cards.
title: Spurn

flavor: There is little that the Ley cannot touch in Calbria.
text: Choose one: - {Destroy} target card. - Gain [n].
title: Alter

text: Deal 2 damage to target enemy. {Silence 1} [i] them. After {Arcane Barrage} resolves, you may spend [n] to play a {copy} for {free} [f]. <(You may spend multiple [n].)>
title: Arcane Barrage

flavor: “... in conclusion, whomsoever first crafted the 'Counterspell' should burn in cosmic fire.” - Academy Thesis Paper
text: {Counter} target card.
title: Counterspell

flavor: Best not to incur the wrath of the Academy.
text: Deal 10 damage to target enemy. {Stun} them, then {Stun} them again. <(They lose two resources of their choice.)>
title: Disintegrate

flavor: Who can say what discoveries await at the highest towers of the Academy?
text: Gain [n] for each [n] you have.
title: Enigma

flavor: This would surely go down as Peter's worst day in recent memory.
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> {Disarm 3} [d] target opponent. {Stun} them. <(They lose a resource of their choice.)>
title: Polymorph

text: {Attach} to target opponent until your next turn. They are {Exhausted}. <(Damage they take can't be reduced, they can't gain HP, and if they would draw a card, they instead take 5 damage.)>
title: Ray of Exhaustion

flavor: His magic was faultless—a brilliant display of arcanomancy perfected over a lifetime.
text: {Cantrip} <(You may pay [n] to play this.)> You may play a card from your hand. If it resolves, return it to your hand.
title: Spellsurge

flavor: There is fantastic and boggling magic within. Not recommended for new wizards.
text: {Slow 1} [o] target opponent.
title: Time Spiral

flavor: Is it the Lady's work? Or perhaps something else?
text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand, then shuffle your deck.
title: Wish

flavor: A thousand shattered angles make reality difficult to perceive.
text: You may return an {Attack} card from your discard to your hand. {Attach} to yourself. After you resolve an {Attack} card targeting an enemy, deal 1 damage to them.
title: Echoes

flavor: Don't fret. It's for the best if you simply forget.
text: {Counter} target card unless its controller pays 2 {Resources}. If the card is {Countered}, return it to the top of their deck.
title: Hypnotize

flavor: Do you even remember who you are?
text: Play {Mimic} as if it were an {Attack} card in another player's discard, then put that card on the bottom of their deck.
title: Mimic

flavor: What is and isn't real means less when either will kill you.
text: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. You may put up to six copies of {Mind Spike} into your deck.
title: Mind Spike

flavor: You're simply seeing things. Mayhap you should visit the medicus?
text: {Travel} up to two tiles. If the tile you were in is empty, {Attach} {Mirror Image} to it. At the end of your turn, {Stun} each opponent near {Mirror Image}.
title: Mirror Image

flavor: You're not sure if you're feeling alright.
text: Add an instance of each type of {Control} target opponent is affected by to them.
title: Perplex

flavor: You don't wish your enemies dead. Only raving mad.
text: Target opponent puts the top seven cards of their deck into their discard. {Slow 2} [o] them. {Disarm 2} [d] them.
title: Phantasma

flavor: Their limbs move, and yet, they are not their own.
text: {Attach} to target {Trait} another player controls. You control that {Trait}.
title: Puppeteer

flavor: There are infinite possible futures. Where you go now is up to you.
text: You may play a card for {free} [f] unless any opponent deals 5 damage to themselves.
title: Schism

flavor: Suddenly, you remember that you were attending a grand Altan ball.
text: Heal yourself 3 HP.
title: Vanity

flavor: The Kingswood is your realm. You've hidden yourself away for years, waiting for a chance to put a sleepy town under your spell.
text: At the start of your turn, make a tile near you {Enchanted Terrain} [et].
title: Enchanting
